data.title: Movement Distance
data.statement:
Bob is given a set of directions. Find the distance he is from his starting position with 2 decimal places.
Here are the directions:
{{N}} - 1 unit North
{{E}} - 1 unit East
{{S}} - 1 unit South
{{W}} - 1 unit West

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read s:word(3)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[n]].
<<Next [[n]] lines:>> A string [[s]] being one of the 4 directions stated above.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A float rounded to 2 decimal places representing the distance Bob is from his starting position.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Bob is given a set of directions. Find the distance he is from his starting position with 2 decimal places.
Here are the directions:
N - 1 unit North
E - 1 unit East
S - 1 unit South
W - 1 unit West
Input
Line 1: An integer n.
Next n lines: A string s being one of the 4 directions stated above.
Output
Line 1: A float rounded to 2 decimal places representing the distance Bob is from his starting position.
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 20
Example
Input
4
N
N
N
N
Output
4.00
